instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1466: What is A1466? A1466 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Early 2015, 2017, Mid 2012, Mid 2013, Early 2014 with EMC 2925, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00165, 820-3209, 820-3437..

threads.title: 00165 Ram Upgrade
threads.message: Is it possible to upgrade 00165/00164 to 16gb ram?  I've been done 8gb but these days on newer os they are running pretty slow.  I have a 4gb 00165that customer sold to me instead of fixing and wanted to upgrade to 16gb if possible.  If it can which ram type do i need?

threads.title: 00165 Ram Upgrade
threads.message:
[URL unfurl="true"]https://www.google.com/search?q=<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>+8gb+ram+upgrade&client=firefox-b-d&bih=615&biw=1408&hl=es&ei=zMSnYua-OIjuaKvCkagC&ved=0ahUKEwjm1L-Vx6v4AhUINxoKHSthBCUQ4dUDCA0&uact=5&oq=<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>+8gb+ram+upgrade&gs_lcp=Cgdnd3Mtd2l6EAM6BAgAEEdKBAhBGABKBAhGGABQ0RZY9x5goCNoAHACeACAAX2IAeMBkgEDMC4ymAEAoAEByAEIwAEB&sclient=gws-wiz[/URL]
You have some videos in the first results...

threads.title: 00165 Ram Upgrade
threads.message:
there were plenty of 8gb ram upgrades but that wasn't what i was looking for.  i wanted 16gb ram upgrade.  i only found one guy who did it on youtube which is why i asked the quesiton. Anyways, i think i ordered the correct ram (not sure becuase the video wasn't that high quality) and followed the same resistor swap.  now am getting beeps on startup.

Ram i ordered: [URL]https://www.ebay.com/itm/313627948809?ssPageName=STRK%3AMEBIDX%3AIT&_trksid=p2060353.m2749.l2649[/URL]
video i followed: [MEDIA=youtube]RgEfMzMxX5E[/MEDIA]

again, if you could help me out i would very much appreciate it.

threads.title: 00165 Ram Upgrade
threads.message:
There are 4 lines to configure RAM capacity and brand, <SIGNAL>XDP_MLB_RAMCFG0</SIGNAL>-3.
<RESISTOR>R1611</RESISTOR>/35/36/31 are the pull-up resistors.
<RESISTOR>R2053</RESISTOR>/52/51/50 are the pull-down resistors.
The guy from that video only switched CFG3 to 1 (high level) from 0.
The other 3 lines depends of his original configuration.
If you had different chips on the MLB (than him), then need to play with CFG0-2 configuration.
That means 8 options possible.

I extracted 8GB configuration from other video:
- HYNIX        0010
- SAMSUNG    0110    K4E6E304EE-EGCE
- ELPIDA    1110
- MICRON    1010

If you get it working with 16GB, then post full configuration.
